summary: This document is a financial statement from Fifth Third Bank for Scio Verum Corporation, detailing account activity for September 2014. It includes information on deposits, withdrawals, and service charges, as well as the account balance at the beginning and end of the month.

persons.name: Helene Totentino
persons.context: Helene Totentino is identified as the relationship manager for the business account of Scio Verum Corporation.

locations: Fifth Third Bank, PO Box 630900, Cincinnati, OH 45263-0900
Scio Verum Corporation, 27 High Tech Blvd, Thomasville, NC 27360
keyFacts: The account statement covers the period from September 1, 2014, to September 30, 2014.
The beginning balance of the account was $85,690.08, and the ending balance was $54,549.77.
Total withdrawals during the period amounted to $56,613.65, while total deposits were $25,833.34.
Significant withdrawals included payroll payments to Paychex Inc. and tax payments.
A service charge of $26.50 was applied on September 11, 2014.
